attributes.action: Give the British more right to defend themselves instead of futilely banning cultural treasures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More people get shot than assaulted by 'samurai swords', and yet a blanket ban has been quietly introduced banning all curved weapons over 50cm in length. While I have been threatened at gun point outside a train station and threatened with a stanley knife on the tube, I have NEVER seen someone using a 'samurai sword' in public. Allow the British their interest in historic weaponry and their right to defend themselves in their own homes!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
